name: cordova-app-loader
description: Cordova App Loader - remote update your cordova app

scripts.cordova-promise-fs: npm run-script cordova-promise-fs prepublish && cp node_modules/cordova-file-cache/node_modules/cordova-promise-fs/CordovaPromiseFS.js www/lib/CordovaPromiseFS.js
scripts.cordova-app-loader: gluejs --include index.js --include node_modules/cordova-file-cache/index.js --main index.js --global CordovaAppLoader > www/lib/CordovaAppLoader.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run-script bootstrap && npm run-script cordova-promise-fs && npm run-script cordova-app-loader

author: Mark Marijnissen
